document_data.name: Earth Mother's Bounty
document_data.mainbody: '''Earth Mother's Bounty''' was a shop located in the [[Chauntea]]n temple-farm of [[Goldenfields]] in the [[Dessarin Valley]].
document_data.Location: It was located near the main gates of Goldenfields, visible to all who passed within.
document_data.Description:
The shop was a stone building with an open facade. It featured a sign that proudly displayed the shop's name: ''Earth Mother's Bounty''.

In front of the shop was a well-trodden roundabout decorated with a 20-foot-tall (6.1 meters) wooden statue of [[Chauntea]]. She was depicted as a rotund woman standing in a field of wheat.
document_data.Services: The shop sold various types of seeds as well as decorative cornucopias to the abbey's visitors.
